Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/util/Math/arbRat
Synopsis Generate an arbitrary rational value.
Function
  1. rat arbRat()
  2. rat arbRat(int limit1, int limit2)
Usage import util::Math;
Examples 
rascal>import util::Math;
ok
rascal>arbRat();
rat: -208664343r40273363
rascal>arbRat();
rat: -18367502r73008453
rascal>arbRat();
rat: -1181783851r1735992522
rascal>arbRat(10,100);
rat: 3r11
rascal>arbRat(10,100);
rat: 2r71
rascal>arbRat(10,100);
rat: 2r91
